formdata.description: Optional course to attach the PDF to. The id of an existing record in the courses table.
Optional section to attach the PDF to (must belong to the course). The id of an existing record in the sections table.
Optional video association (must belong to the course). The id of an existing record in the videos table.
Optional center ID that the instructor belongs to. The id of an existing record in the centers table.
Contact email for the instructor. Must be a valid email address.
Optional center ID for the instructor. The id of an existing record in the centers table.
Contact email for the instructor. Must be a valid email address.
